title: Furan and benzene ring formation in cellulose char: the roles of 5-HMF and reducing ends
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,21544-21552
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03344B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Takashi Nomoura, Eiji Minami, Haruo Kawamoto
Furan and benzene structures in cellulose char are formed by direct rearrangement of 5-HMF to phenols, Diels–Alder reactions of furan rings with double bonds to benzofurans and a random mechanism via reactive fragments for benzene rings.
